title: Exploring data - restaurant server tip amounts

content.question: Directions: Show all your work. Indicate clearly the methods you use, because you will be scored on the correctness of your methods as well as on the accuracy and completeness of your results and explanations. Robin works as a server in a small restaurant, where she can earn a tip (extra money) from each customer she serves. The histogram below shows the distribution of her 60 tip amounts for one day of work. Write a few sentences to describe the distribution of tip amounts for the day shown. One of the tip amounts was $8. If the $8 tip had been $18, what effect would the increase have had on the following statistics? Justify your answers. The mean: The median:
